This page is to list the previous Ubuntu Chicago meeting minutes. If you are creating a new Minutes page after a team meeting, please use the 'Create a New Page' section below. If you are looking for archived minutes for past meetings, please see the entries at the bottom.

=== Create New Page ===
To create a new minutes page, enter the date as '''"YYYY-MM-DD"''' in the following box, and click create.
